subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The contract specialists in the commissioner’s office completed their computations of 2006 payrolls and sent tax bills to the Yankees and the Red Sox, the only teams that exceeded the $136.5 million threshold.
snippet: The contract specialists in the commissioner’s office completed their computations of 2006 payrolls and sent tax bills to the Yankees and the Red Sox, the only teams that exceeded the $136.5 million threshold.
